about_the_game:
Feralbound Online is an online, animal-based multiplayer experience with a focus on social features.
Create your very own avatar with our comprehensive character creation system, allowing you to customize every aspect of your character's appearance. From a selection of animal species to distinctive user created markings, unleash your creativity and bring your unique vision to life.
Explore a multitude of worlds hosted by your friends or venture into realms crafted by the community. Engage in roleplay experiences and immerse yourself in dynamic environments teeming with life and activity. Whether you're roaming through dense forests, taking shelter from harsh weather, or taking part in gatherings, the adventure never ends in FeralBound Online.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9400F or AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB or AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Feralbound Online encourages you to survive, roleplay, and fight to your hearts content. Featuring endless possibilities for customization; journey throughout different lands as you uncover secrets and meet new friends!
